üìë "Crepe: type of very thin pastry, usually made from wheat flour or buckwheat flour...are made by pouring a wheat batter onto a frying pan...often with a trace of butter or vegetable oil on pan's surface. Batter...spread evenly over the cooking surface...until the cooked side looks like the surface of the moon, then it is turned over to cook....

Sweet cr√™pes ...generally made with wheat flour | Savory cr√™pes are made with non-wheat flours such as buckwheat. Batters can also consist of other simple ingredients such as butter, milk, water, eggs, flour, salt, and sugar." - Wikipedia
___________________________________________________________________________
**9/26/2017**
SF Test: **3.5%** | 60/40 | Wasp Nano | Organic Japanese Cotton | 40 Watts

 

‚ñ∫**First Impressions (24 hour steep ‚úî)**

‚Ä¢ **Knuckle Test:  Smell & Taste**

--- Bottle Aroma: Intense | Aroma of almost a "citrus"... faint butter...and fried dough with spice

--- Moderate Sweetness, Creamy with the bite of an Astringent Note or Spice
___________________________________________________________________________
**10/03/2017 (1 Week Steep ‚úî)**

 

‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle Aroma**: Aroma Intensity - Unchanged | Spice...Possibly Anise or Clove 

‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:** Light Sweetness | Spice with Light Fried or Oily Dough 

‚Ä¢ **Vape:** Sweetness - Faint | Flavor Instensity Moderate | Light Yeast / Bread with a Coating 
of Warm Dry Spice = (Anise...Clove...?) & some Zest - Could be spice...

---|Light Body but Coated Mouth Feel | Overall Dry & Slightly Tart

 

‚ñ∫Notes

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: Spice / Tartness

‚Ä¢ Little - No Noticeable: Egg, Dairy, or Butter notes
___________________________________________________________________________
**10/10/2017 (2 Week Steep ‚úî)**

 


‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle Aroma:** Aroma Intensity Unchanged = Strong ‚úì 

------|  ‚òÖ"Spice" Aroma Identifiable vs "Citrus" Aroma = Not Citrus

‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:** Sweetness ‚Üë = Mod. | Spice & Light "Fried/Oily" Dough = More Blended

‚Ä¢ **Vape:** Overall Warmer & More Rounded
Med.Flavor Intensity | Lighter "Dough/Yeast" Flavor coated with Spice ||| ‚òÖNot Citrus

--- Body & Mouth Feel = Same ‚úì | Semi Dry & Somewhat Watery 

 


‚ñ∫ Notes

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: Same as week 1 ‚úì 
___________________________________________________________________________
**10/17/017 (3 Week Steep ‚úî) FINAL**

 


‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle Aroma:** Slight ‚Üìin Aroma Intensity - Med.Strong 
----  "Spice" (possibly Clove or Anise) Aroma over a Light "Oily Dough"  

‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:** Unchanged from Wk 2 ‚úì 

Mod Sweetness | Mod.Heavy Spice flavor over a Light "Fried Dough"

‚Ä¢ **Vape:** Unchanged from Wk 2 ‚úì

Med.Flavor Intensity | Light Sweetness | Light & Soft "Dough" like Flavor (Submissive) blended with Spice (Dominant)

---- Light - Mod. Body | Semi - Dry & Watery Mouth Feel 

 


‚ñ∫ Notes: 4 ‚òÖ's = Inclusion of Spice (Not Mentioned in Concentrate Description)

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: Spice: Anise or Clove? | Lt. Tartness

‚Ä¢ Bakeries & Pastries
+ Butter & Possible Fruits / "Preserves" that Pair well with *Spice*
